ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Fighter armor and weapons at low level
ygData.msgSnippet: Opinions vary. I personally find the whole power leveling idea to be most dishonorable. To see an orc camp taken over by a 50+ druid and a lv 6 ogre warrior in
ygData.messageBody:
Opinions vary. I personally find the whole power leveling idea to be most dishonorable. To see an orc camp taken over by a 50+ druid and a lv 6 ogre warrior in full crafted with a wurmslayer reminds me how people are have no willingness to work for things (the whole cheat code thing). But many people find it ok to twink/power level and, well, so be it. I can see it, shiver, and keep moving. Live and let live. I am fortunate that at lv 43 I can solo and this is only an inconvience at worse to me instead of a real issue. But up until lv 35 I was still having camps stolen from me by uber twinks and anon druids.
-----Original Message-----
From: Thomas H. Comegys [mailto:comegys@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 29, 2001 5:06 AM

Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Fighter armor and weapons at low level
